General.Name: Gema Grahasarana Tbk
General.Description: PT Gema Grahasarana Tbk operates as an interior contractor and furniture manufacturer in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Interior, Furniture ,Mechanical, and Electrical; and Distribution and Trade segments. It offers interior fit-outs, furniture and panel manufacturing, mechanical and electrical installation, maintenance, and logistics. The company also manufactures and sells customized, modular, home and office, and hospitality furniture. In addition, it provides mechanical, electrical, data, and voice installation services. Further, the company is involved in trading laminated material interior and furniture; house, and office furniture and equipment; and interior and furniture components. It serves banking and financial, mining and energy, retail and hospitality, and multinational company and other sectors. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Gema Grahasarana Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Virucci Indogriya Sarana.

2.Name: Ms. Ilda Imelda Tatang
